InstalledItem.Name: Anvil Hornet F7C Nose Turret
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Turret
Manufacturer: Anvil Aerospace
Size: 3

This nose turret was designed specifically for Anvil's F7C Hornet to allow for mounting two Size-1 weapons and precise gimbaled tracking of targets.

InstalledItem.Name: C4-160f S5 Hornet Ball Turret
InstalledItem.Description: Give your Hornet's firepower a boost with the C4-160f. Designed by Anvil specifically for its F7 series, this S5 ball turret can equip two S2 ship weapons.
